parameters.name: runlength
parameters.description: Number of correct responses required before switching categories.  Typically, 10 are used, although 5 is also common.

parameters.name: usemouse
parameters.description: Whether the mouse should be used to control the test.  If 0, keyboard keys will be used. If non-zero, mouse will be used.

parameters.name: usetimeout
parameters.description: Should a null result occur if you wait too long? if >0, ms of the timeout (3000 is reasonable)
